name: Basic Theory
description: Foundation knowledge for all new drivers including road rules, signs, and safety principles.

name: Driving Basics
description: Essential practical skills for vehicle operation and basic driving maneuvers.

name: Basic Maneuvers
description: Core driving maneuvers including turns, lane changes, and basic positioning.

name: Parking Skills
description: Comprehensive parking techniques for various scenarios and space constraints.

name: Advanced Driving
description: Advanced techniques for highway, night, and challenging weather conditions.

name: Emergency Techniques
description: Critical skills for emergency situations and crisis management while driving.
